II. Purpose of Addendum
Change of location/address
III. Methodology
Wolverine Human Services Aftercare formerly located at 20600 Eureka in Taylor
moved to 20300 Superior in Taylor. An on-site visit was conducted by this
consultant on June 29, 2016.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
Wolverine’s new office is located in Suite 160 on the first floor of a modern multi-story
shared office building. There is ample parking and a private entrance for consumers. A
foyer separates the exterior entrance from the lobby. Consumers will be “buzzed in” by
a receptionist located left of the foyer. The lobby is spacious with new chairs and a
large flat screen television. Glass windows and locked doors separate the staff offices,
kitchen/break room, visiting, storage, training and conference rooms on either side of
the lobby. Docking stations are available for mobile staff. A locked file cabinet is being
prepared to house confidential FBI clearance information.
V. Recommendation
I recommend this agency continue its current licensing status at the new location.
